title: New York Lawmakers Target Prediction Markets as NHL's Rangers Ink Polymarket Deal
description: A New York assemblyman reintroduced a bill that would restrict prediction markets, barring bets on individual sports matches, war, and more.

title: Russians ask government hotlines whether pensions are paid in crypto
description: Crypto-related questions about pension payments are reaching Russia’s Social Fund hotline, suggesting digital assets are entering mainstream financial concerns.

title: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin warns decentralized stablecoins still have deep flaws
description: The Ethereum co-founder argues that price benchmarks, oracle security and staking incentives remain unresolved challenges for decentralized stablecoins.

title: As the market tanks, crypto’s new gold rush is…gold
description: The huge spike in onchain gold signals is that DeFi investors are planning to stay in DeFi, even when the tide turns, argues RAAC founder Kevin Rusher.

title: Bitcoin bear market still in play as power law sees $65K 'do-or-die' price
description: Bitcoin power law analysis concluded that price may face a new battle around $65,000 if BTC spends 2026 as a year of consolidation.

title: Walmart and Google bet on AI agents to reshape how people shop online

title: Trump Says He Won’t Pardon Sam Bankman-Fried
description:

Trump Says He Won’t Pardon Sam Bankman-Fried
President Donald Trump said he will not pardon former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried, rejecting clemency for the convicted crypto executive.

title: Ethereum treasury company BitMine crosses 1 million staked ETH milestone

description: Tax and other regulatory agencies in India claim that cryptocurrencies and permissionless blockchain tech undermine tax collection.

title: Vitalik Buterin says decentralized stablecoins still face three unsolved problems

title: Memecoins hit hardest in rough year that saw 11.6M tokens fail
